news.headline: Report: Tesla's Cybertruck Struggles With Sales, Quality Issues and Customer Backlash
news.summary: Vehicle deliveries dropped 13% in the first quarter of 2025, reaching 337,000 units.

news.headline: Cathie Wood Just Made A Bold Move—Why She Spent Over $65M On Tesla, Robinhood, And Coinbase 'As The Market Crashed'
